name: Hey Aliens! Get off My Gram Gram!
name_original: Hey Aliens! Get off My Gram Gram!
description:
Hey Aliens! Get off My Gram Gram! (HAGoMGG) not only rolls off the tongue, but also features alien-blasting action and my very own, totally KILLER grandmother! Not killer like literally, but figuratively. In other words... awesome. She's awesome. Play it!

Code, story, and thumpin' jazz soundtrack that all the kids are into nowadays by Reinfeldx.

Featuring the voice acting talents of Mary Jane Lauck.

Wicked-awesome artwork by Jacob Zinman-Jeanes, originally for tutsplus.com.

Gram and Cheese sprites modified from original work by users MrBrown and 4lex at piq.codeus.net.

Based on an original Scratch game by Reinfeldx developed for Harvard's CS50.
